description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla Ice Cream With Coffee Drizzle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vanilla Ice Cream With Coffee Drizzle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the ice cream from the freezer and let it soften slightly.
Serve 3 scoops of ice cream into two dessert bowls. Sweeten the coffee with sugar (if using), then pour it over the ice cream and serve immediately.
